data.description:
A portal to new worlds, a virtual home filled with endless experiences to discover and explore, a place to connect with loved ones. World travel, casual games, media customization, adventure, and relaxation.

- Invite your friends and family, and travel together to new places to see the world - hundreds of virtual travels to all continents: take a city tour, a hot air balloon ride, a back-country road trip
- Explore the depth of the ocean - go diving in the Great Barrier Reef of Australia, or swim with dolphins in the Pacific Ocean
- Relax and practice meditation in nature - guided, or unguided
- Listen to classical music
- Play with your virtual pet
- Play games, share photos, upload and watch your own videos - standard, and 360, and step into them together.

Alcove has something for everyone, no matter your age. Download Alcove and start exploring today!

changelog.change_log:
1.214
- Minor bug fixes
  - Fixed checkers freeze when AI attempts to capture multiple pieces.
  - Fixed password reset panel displaying incorrect messaging.

1.211
- We're back!
- Added support for Quest Pro
- Minor visual improvements
- Third party content fixes
- Several bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Multiplayer Improvements:
     • Added support for Meta Avatars
     • Added support for Meta Invites
     • Added room code invite option
     • Improved voice quality
     • Major bug fixes and performance improvements

- Video Improvements:
     • Improved performance
     • Improved buffering speed
     • Several bug fixes

- UI:
     • Major bug fixes and improvements
     • Added alert when internet connection is lost
     • Account creation fixes
     • Visual improvements

  - Fixed checkers freeze when AI attempts to capture multiple pieces.
  - Fixed password reset panel displaying incorrect messaging.

1.194
- Minor bug fixes.

1.193
- Major video content update!
- New Animal category in the travel room!

- Happy St. Patricks Day from Alcove!
- New video content has been added.
- Minor fixes to Staying Sharp DLC.
- Minor bug fixes.

1.188
- Staying Sharp DLC Fixes:
- Fixed several issues in 10x10.
- Free games from the DLC now appear in the interactive menu.
- Minor performance improvements and typo fixes.

1.188
- Staying Sharp DLC Fixes:
   - Fixed several issues in 10x10.
   - Free games from the DLC now appear in the interactive menu.
   - Minor performance improvements and typo fixes.

1.186
- Staying Sharp DLC has been expanded for a total of 60 games!
- Additional games in the Staying Sharp DLC have been made available for free.
- A 3D Icon now displays on videos with stereoscopic content. Check it out!
- UI bug fixes and visual improvements.

------------------------------

1.163 Major Update
Achievements
- 40 Achievements have been added to Alcove!
- See your accomplishments through the new redesigned welcome panel.
- Stay tuned for new achievement sets over time!

User Interface
- Several panels in Alcove have received visual, animation, and audio updates.

Content Updates
- Bells Beach has been added to Australia and Meditation.

Bug Fixes and Improvements
- Hand tracking and controller improvements.
- Various UI and keyboard fixes.
- Smooth Locomotion fixes.
- Various multiplayer and avatar improvements.
- Several graphical improvements.
- Several fixes and improvements in third-party experiences.
- Fix for certain environments missing effects.
- Fix for being unable to interact with the travel hologram globe.
- Multiple performance improvements and minor bugs fixed.

1.188
- Staying Sharp DLC Fixes:
   - Fixed several issues in 10x10.
   - Free games from the DLC now appear in the interactive menu.
   - Minor performance improvements and typo fixes.

1.126
- SpeedSort moved from interactive table to Brain Games DLC
- You can continue to play for free with the preview option!

- Fixed issue with SpeedSort not launching correctly
- Fixed String Recall locking up in certain situations

1.123
- Fixed issue with Globe pointing to the wrong version of Wander
- Fixed issue with quick menu when using Quest 1
- Fixed issue with Quest 2 pointers

1.121
- Fixed back button not working on Quest 2
- Added all Virtuleap games to the cube in the health area

1.120
- New experience from Virtuleap, Magic Deck!
- Two new visitation videos from David Lobser!
- Fixed case where users were unable to interact in the Travel area
- Fixed chess promotion not updating visuals
- Adjusted volume and sound for high score in Staying Sharp DLC
- Fixed case where you could follow a user while leading them

1.115
- Over 20 new brain games added to the Staying Sharp bundle!
- Fix for an issue that could cause avatars to appear as only hands without a body 
- Voice communication is now maintained while users are in single player games

1.111
- Hotfix for missing Brain Games content.

1.110
- Happy holidays from Alcove!
- Festive decor has been added to the living room
- New holiday music videos have been added to the violin
- Previous Staying Sharp games have returned to the interactive table
- Performance and memory improvements

1.108
New Premium Content:
- Into Space by Faber Courtial -- Take off into space with 2 gravity-defying expeditions, 14 and 11 minutes each. These award-winning short VR films from Faber Courtial took the world by storm at Cannes XR, Venice Film Festival, Tribeca and many more, by conveying how it must feel to actually be out in the open cosmos. Visit unknown worlds of extraordinary richness, detail and authenticity - perfectly reconstructed in 3D from original NASA and ESA data. 
- AARP Staying Sharp Games --Test your recall, focus, word skills and more with this variety fun-pack of 22 short, 1-minute games! Track your progress and master 3 levels of difficulty in the categories of Logic, Language, Visual, Speed, Focus and Memory, recreated from AARP’s popular Staying Sharp digital program (https://stayingsharp.aarp.org/about/brain-health/games-play/). Season one includes Visual Sudoku, Mahjong Match, Grow Words, Math Bubbles, Pipe Dreams, Secret Symbols, and many more favorites from AARP’s premium content. Have you played the original version? Which one do you like more? 

New Feature:
- Photo rotation - we've added the ability to rotate photos. Click on each photo to bring up the options.
